Inquiry.title: Inquiry
Inquiry.description: Represents an inquiry submitted through the contact or CTA forms.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Inquiry entity.

name.description: Name of the person making the inquiry.

service.description: The service the person is interested in.

idea.description: The message or idea from the person.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the inquiry was submitted.

Client.title: Client
Client.description: Represents a client of Hajaro Grahako.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Client entity (matches Firebase Auth UID).

firstName.description: The first name of the client.

lastName.description: The last name of the client.

email.description: The email address of the client.

phone.description: The phone number of the client.

companyName.description: The name of the client's company.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a project undertaken by Hajaro Grahako for a client.

clientId.description: Reference to Client's UID. (Relationship: Client 1:N Project)

startDate.description: The start date of the project.

endDate.description: The end date of the project.

status.description: The current status of the project (e.g., 'In Progress', 'Completed', 'On Hold').

budget.description: The budget allocated to the project.

serviceTier.description: The service tier selected for the project (Basic, Standard, Premium, Enterprise).

progress.description: The completion percentage of the project (0-100).

TeamMember.title: TeamMember
TeamMember.description: Represents a team member working at Hajaro Grahako.

id.description: Unique identifier for the TeamMember entity.

firstName.description: The first name of the team member.

lastName.description: The last name of the team member.

email.description: The email address of the team member.

role.description: The role of the team member within the company.

bio.description: A short biography of the team member.

ProjectTimeline.title: ProjectTimeline
ProjectTimeline.description: Represents a timeline entry for a specific project.

date.description: The date of the timeline event.

description.description: A description of the timeline event.

Invoice.title: Invoice
Invoice.description: Represents an invoice for a project.

invoiceDate.description: The date the invoice was issued.

amount.description: The amount due on the invoice.

dueDate.description: The date the invoice is due.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a message exchanged within a project.

senderId.description: The UID of the user who sent the message (client or team member).

senderName.description: The display name of the sender.

senderAvatar.description: URL to the sender's avatar image.

timestamp.description: The date and time the message was sent.

/inquiries/{inquiryId}.description: Stores inquiries from the contact and CTA forms. Publicly writable.

/subscribers/{email}.description: Stores email addresses for manual newsletter export. Publicly writable.

/clients/{clientId}.description: Stores client information. Accessible only to authenticated users with appropriate roles.

/projects/{projectId}.description: Stores project details. Accessible to team members and associated clients. Includes denormalized 'clientId' for authorization independence.

/projects/{projectId}/timeline/{timeline.description: Stores timeline entries for each project. Accessible only by the project's client or assigned team members.

/projects/{projectId}/invoices/{invoiceI.description: Stores invoices for each project. Accessible only by the project's client or assigned team members.

/projects/{projectId}/messages/{messageI.description: Stores messages for each project. Accessible only by the project's client or assigned team members.

/team_members/{teamMemberId}.description: Stores team member information. Accessible only to authenticated admin users.
